name: MHTOCSMMConditionPuerperalCerebrovascularDisorders
title: MH TOC Severe Maternal Morbidity Condition Puerperal Cerebrovascular Disorders
description: The MH TOC Severe Maternal Morbidity Condition Puerperal Cerebrovascular Disorders is derived from the MH TOC Severe Maternal Morbidity Condition Profile. This derived profile specifies an individual SMM indicator code by binding to an extension, ValueSet, and CodeSystem. /n There are 30 ICD-10 codes specified for Puerperal Cerebrovascular Disorders in this profile: A81.2, G45.x, G46.x, G93.49, H34.0x, I60.xx, I61.xx, I62.xx, I63.00, I63.01x, I63.1xx, I63.2xx, I63.3xx, I63.4xx, I63.5xx, I63.6, I63.8x, I63.9, I65.xx, I66.xx, I67.xx, I68.xx, O22.50, O22.52, O22.53, I97.810, I97.811, I97.820, I97.821, O87.3
